ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Tales from Oz
ComicInfo.Summary:
From the time of her birth Zamora was destined to be the most powerful good witch in the history of Oz. But one tragic event changed her life forever and sent her down a path of darkness that that lead her to the Horde, and instead made her the most evil witch to ever live.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Ken Lashley & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Marat Mychaels & Ross Campbell | 2 | C | Cover C | Jose Luis & Urszula Mos | 3 |
